p: Within the actions taken to suppress transmission of SARS-CoV-2, Colombia closed universities and colleges to decrease the spread of this virus. Table 2 describes the time when this measures were taken in different countries, after the first case detected, as well as the number of people infected and deaths at the time of starting these actions. Additionally, from March 21 Colombia will be restricting the entry of foreigners, closing bars and clubs, and establishing quarantine for several days in the most populated cities as Medellin and Bogota.
